net.sourceforge.taglets.simple
Interface Logger

All Known Implementing Classes:
TextFilterLogger
public interface Logger

Logging interface to emit debugging and information messages, as well as warnings and errors.

Note:

During taglet output creation the logger is bound to the JavaDoc doclet logging facility. Warnings and errors printed count towards the total of warnings and errors maintained by the JavaDoc standard doclet.

Version:
1.8 (2008/03/30 12:43:13)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.5.2

Method Detail

debug

void debug(String message)
Logs the specified debugging message.

Note:

Debugging messages are only printed if the debug option is activated at the taglets configuration.

Parameters:
message - the debugging message to log.
Since:
1.5.2

info

void info(String message)
Logs the specified information message.

Note:

Informational messages are only printed if verbose message output is activated at the taglets configuration.

Parameters:
message - the message to emit.
Since:
1.5.2

warning

void warning(String message)
Logs the specified warning message.

Note:

Warning messages printed using the simple logger are completely separate from the JavaDoc doclet logging facility.

Parameters:
message - the message to emit.
Since:
1.5.2

error

void error(String message)
Logs the specified error message.

Note:

Error messages printed using the simple logger are completely separate from the JavaDoc doclet logging facility.

Parameters:
message - the message to emit.
Since:
1.5.2
